caption.p: Amperometric responses of yeast-modified electrodes to 0.2 mmol/L L-lactic acid: not affected by vapors (short-dashed line), after 20 min (long-dashed line) and after 40 min (solid line) of subjection to vapors of Rh. tomentosum EO (8 Sh); phosphate buffer pH 7.3 contained 0.5 mmol/L K 3[Fe(CN) 6]; operating potential 0.3 V.
